params: SEARCH FLAGS(no_segment) SoftwareInstance, RuntimeEnvironment where age_count > 1 and (version defined and not version = "") SHOW split(name, " on ")[1], type, version PROCESSWITH displayHistory((currentTime() - $days*24*3600*10000000), currentTime(), 2)

sourceQuery.rawQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT 
          BT_CHG_ASSOCIATIONS.`Request Description01` AS `Host`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Infrastructure Change ID` AS `ChangeID`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Scheduled Start Date` AS `Scheduled Start`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Scheduled End Date` AS `Scheduled End`
         ,BT_CHG_ASSOCIATIONS.`Request Type01` AS `RequestType`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.Submitter AS `Submitter`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.ASCHG AS `Assignee`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Change Request Status` AS `ChangeRequestStatus`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.Description AS `Description`

FROM `AR System Schema`.`CHG:Infrastructure Change` BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE LEFT OUTER JOIN `AR System Schema`.`CHG:Associations` BT_CHG_ASSOCIATIONS
     ON ( BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Infrastructure Change ID` = BT_CHG_ASSOCIATIONS.`Request ID02` )
        (
          (
              BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Change Request Status`  = 'Implementation In Progress'
          )
      OR (
              BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Change Request Status`  = 'Request For Authorization'
          )
      OR (
              BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Change Request Status`  = 'Completed'
          )
        )

params: SEARCH FLAGS(no_segment) Host,NetworkDevice,StorageDevice WHERE age_count > 1 AND (logical_ram defined OR num_logical_processors defined)  SHOW local_fqdn, logical_ram, num_logical_processors PROCESS WITH displayHistory((currentTime() - $days*24*3600*10000000), currentTime(), 1)

params: SEARCH VirtualMachine where age_count > 1 SHOW vm_name, ram, num_processors, cores_per_socket, vm_uuid, vm_tools_version PROCESS WITH displayHistory((currentTime() - $days*24*3600*10000000), currentTime(), 1)

panels.title: Virtual Machine changes in past $days days

sourceQuery.rawQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT 
          BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Infrastructure Change ID` AS `ChangeID`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Scheduled Start Date` AS `Scheduled Start`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Scheduled End Date` AS `Scheduled End`
         ,BT_CHG_ASSOCIATIONS.`Request Type01` AS `RequestType`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.Submitter AS `Submitter`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.ASCHG AS `Assignee`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Change Request Status` AS `ChangeRequestStatus`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.Description AS `Description`

FROM `AR System Schema`.`CHG:Infrastructure Change` BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE LEFT OUTER JOIN `AR System Schema`.`CHG:Associations` BT_CHG_ASSOCIATIONS
     ON ( BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Infrastructure Change ID` = BT_CHG_ASSOCIATIONS.`Request ID02` )
WHERE 
        (
          (
              BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Change Request Status`  = 'Implementation In Progress'
          )
      OR (
              BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Change Request Status`  = 'Request For Authorization'
          )
      OR (
              BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Change Request Status`  = 'Completed'
          )
        )
